results.title: How to replace missing values by mode or median in R
results.body:
dataset$Time_in_Employment = ifelse(is.na(dataset$Time_in_Employment),

                                    ave(dataset$Time_in_Employment, FUN = function(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)),

                     dataset$Time_in_Employment)


I want to replace the missing values by most frequent or median values but unable to find

Kindly help and guide
